details.replyText:
Dear S. Shankar Roy,  

Thank you for your review. While we're glad to hear you enjoyed the food, we noticed the 0/5 rating and are concerned that something may not have met your expectations during your stay at The Royale Retreat Apartment Varanasi. Your satisfaction is incredibly important to us, and we’d truly appreciate it if you could share more details about what went wrong. This will help us address any issues and make improvements.  

We deeply value your feedback and hope you'll give us another chance to provide you with an experience more in line with our standards. Please don’t hesitate to reach out directly—I’d love to personally assist you!  

Warm regards,  
[Your Name]  
Manager, The Royale Retreat Apartment
